tool_description: Optimizes sample collection schedules based on patient availability, staff schedules, test requirements, and resource constraints.

patient_ids.description: List of patients requiring sample collection

available_staff.description: List of available staff member IDs

error_messages: Invalid patient list: One or more patient_ids are not found in the system.
Invalid collection date: collection_date must be in the future and in valid ISO 8601 format.
No available staff: available_staff list is empty or contains invalid staff IDs.
Optimization failed: Unable to create feasible schedule with given constraints.
Priority weight mismatch: priority_weights array length must match patient_ids length if provided.
usage: Optimize collection schedules by providing patient_ids, collection_date, and available_staff. Optionally include priority_weights and time_constraints for better optimization.

optimized_schedule.description: Optimized collection schedule with time slots and assignments

schedule_efficiency.description: Efficiency score of the optimized schedule (0-100)

unscheduled_patients.description: Patients that could not be scheduled due to constraints
